'''Untvad''' is a village near the Taluka headquarters [[Babra, Gujarat|Babra]] in [[Amreli district]] of [[Gujarat]] in the country of [[India]]. It is situated to the west of Babra and to the north of [[Amreli]]. The main road linking Chavand - Babra - Kotdapitha passes through Untvad. Bhurakhiya Hanuman Mandir Khodiyar Mandir are the major attractions accessible from here. [[Rajkot Airport]] and [[Lathi, Gujarat|Lathi]] Railway Station serve Untvad.
==References== *{{cite web|url=http://www.india9.com/i9show/Untvad-80537.htm|title=Untvad in India|publisher=india9.com|accessdate=2014-01-25}} [[Category:Villages in Amreli district]] {{Amreli-geo-stub}}
